channel.title: Hmmmm Heres a project im working on
channel.description: If you would like to help ill gladly take it =P im workin on a way to make it so like if you add a fame or a rep system when you kill a monster you get fame or rep and if you get enough fame or rep you get a new thing you can do like say you need 400 fame or rep to enter a building then you would have to kill enough monsters to get into that room. and another way to get fame ro rep is by killing people want dead like a wanted list and people put there money or rep on there or how much rep willing to give and other players come to that list and see who wants who dead and that person trys to find them and kills them =P just thought of it this morning and thought if i finished it it would make a kick @$$ tutorial! if you would like to help just post post post!! peace out peeps!

item.title: Hmmmm Heres a project im working on
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

kinda…but its not a skill =P just something to do =P and ya cops and robbers =P i got it from Fable the lost chapters he has a renowned system on it and its kool so i thought "HEY! i want to try that on my server someday =P[br][size=1]Posted on: June 21, 2007, 08:15:43 AM[/size][hr]no one else likes this idea? how sad… man i guess i won’t do it…i was hoping for like atleast 10 replys by now but…ya… sorry admins for posts twice =P

Read full topic
